message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value for you. This item is worth $1000000 to you, and I am extending this chance to own it at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I kindly propose to offer the product to you at $950000. This price not only ensures a substantial return for me but also allows you to secure this valuable asset at a premium yet reasonable cost. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
